root.name: Mystery Case Files: Huntsville
root.description: OverviewMystery Case Files: Huntsville is a hidden objects game developed and published by Big Fish Games for the PC and Mac platforms.Story and GameplayAfter a series of crimes occur in Huntsville, Alabama, the player takes on the role of an aspiring "Master Detective" who is sent to solve the crimes. Each of the fifteen levels presents a different crime, and the player must find different "clues" in various hidden object scenes, using them to uncover the criminal and receive further information about the crime organization S.T.A.I.N., believed to be behind all of the criminal activity in the town. In order to achieve the role of "Master Detective" the player must discover who is the "Big Boss" of S.T.A.I.N.
